Actually @agansa I managed to get around it.
The problem is it if you don't specify your --config it's monolithic by default.
Check my building command here:

bazel build \
            --config=opt \
            --copt=-msse4.2 \
            --copt=-mavx \
            --copt=-mavx2 \
            --copt=-mfma \
            --copt=-O3 \
            //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

body:
Actually @agansa I managed to get around it. 
The problem is it if you don't specify your `--config` it's monolithic by default.
Check my building command here:
```
bazel build \
            --config=opt \
            --copt=-msse4.2 \
            --copt=-mavx \
            --copt=-mavx2 \
            --copt=-mfma \
            --copt=-O3 \
            //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```
